title: Blake Lively sticks her finger up Ryan Reynolds' nose as his birthday tributes roll in
text:
Ryan Reynolds was not at a shortage of birthday greetings as he turned 43 on Wednesday, with his wife Blake Lively and pal Salma Hayek among those offering him well-wishes.

The Deadpool actor is known for his comical nature on social media, as many of the incoming greetings were of a tongue-in-cheek nature in step with the Vancouver, Canada native's spirit.

Lively, 32, who last month celebrated her seventh wedding anniversary to the actor, shared a shot of the pair posing as she gently probed his nostril, tagging herself as Gisele Bündchen in the post.

And many more! Ryan Reynolds was not at a shortage of birthday greetings as he turned 43 on Wednesday, with his wife Blake Lively, 32, and pal Salma Hayek, 53, among those offering him well wishes

'I picked a good one,' the Gossip Girl actress wrote. 'Happy birthday @vancityreynolds.'

Hayek, 53, who shared the screen with the star in the comedy The Hitman's Bodyguard two years ago, shared a shot of herself posed next to Reynolds while holding up a bottle of Aviation American Gin, a brand he's invested in.

'Yes, Ryan, I am using your birthday to post this picture where I don’t look so bad, while you look all beat up,' the Frida star wrote. She noted that Reynolds had promised her to send gin 'ALMOST TWO MONTHS AGO.

She added: 'If you want to see more picture of yourself, please look at my stories... oh and Happy Birthday by the way.'

Cheeky: Lively, 32, who last month celebrated her seventh wedding anniversary to the actor, shared a shot of the pair posing as she gently probed his nostril, tagging herself as Gisele Bündchen in the post

Introspective: The leading man looked happy and fulfilled in a selfie he posted Wednesday

Prank: Salma Hayek ribbed Ryan on her Instagram Stories, intentionally cropping him out of pictures she posted that featured Samuel L. Jackson, their co-star in The Hitman's Bodyguard

Too cute! Ryan also shared an adorable clip of his mother Tammy Reynolds playing a ukulele in honor of the big day

Hayek kept the gag going on her Instagram Stories, intentionally cropping Reynolds out of pictures she posted that featured Samuel L. Jackson, their co-star in The Hitman's Bodyguard.

'Happy Birthday to one of my dear friends Ryan Reynolds,' she said. 'Love sharing the screen with you.'

Ryan also shared an adorable clip of his mother Tammy Reynolds playing a ukulele in honor of the big day. He wrote: 'Tam-tam! My mom learned the Ukulele at 73 yrs old. She is a legend.'

Hugh Jackman, who has a famed mock rivalry with the actor, had not yet chimed in with a message for his colleague.

The actor also shared a slew of birthday wishes from friends and co-workers including screenwriter Simon Kinberg, comic Lil Rel Howery, stuntman Alex Kyshkovych, dancer Yanis Marshall and actor Justin Johnston.
